data.persona: I usually go to the park to watch my child play. I am a one and only child. I am my parent's favorite child.
data.description:
You are in the Temple courtyard.
There are lots of ornate statues everywhere.  It is pretty busy because everyone comes here to pray. There are colorful pieces of cloth tied randomly everywhere.  There is also a huge statue in the middle that everyone is gathered around to pray.
There's a table, a statue, a stand, a cloth, a huge statue, and an ornate statue here.
The priests and the woman are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to stop the wizards from hurting the woman
data.mid_motivation: I hope to protect my mother today
data.long_motivation: I hope my mother remains with me for a long time
